text: Adobe Lightroom (officially Adobe Photoshop Lightroom) is Adobe graphics program for working with digital photos. It can be used for "manifesting" "digital negatives" (DNG, RAW data formats), retouching photos and organizing their catalog. The first version was introduced in 2007. Version Lightroom Classic (11.4.1) was launched on June 29, 2022. == References == Category:Graphics software Category:Vector graphics editors Category:Adobe software
title: Adobe Lightroom
